metadata.name: Uncommon  Assistive Technology Applications Execution Via AtBroker.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the start of a non built-in assistive technology applications via "Atbroker.EXE".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\atbroker.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('atbroker.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('start')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('animations')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('audiodescription')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caretbrowsing')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('caretwidth')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('colorfiltering')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cursorindicator')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cursorscheme')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('filterkeys')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('focusborderheight')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('focusborderwidth')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('highcontrast')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('keyboardcues')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('keyboardpref')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('livecaptions')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('magnifierpane')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('messageduration')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('minimumhitradius')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mousekeys')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('narrator')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('osk')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('overlappedcontent')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('showsounds')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('soundsentry')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('speechreco')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('stickykeys')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('togglekeys')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('voiceaccess')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('windowarranging')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('windowtracking')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('windowtrackingtimeout')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('windowtrackingzorder'))) AND NOT contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oracle_javaaccessbridge')))

output.summary: Detects the start of a non built-in assistive technology applications via "Atbroker.EXE".

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate, non-default assistive technology applications execution References: http://www.hexacorn.com/blog/2016/07/22/beyond-good-ol-run-key-part-42/, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Atbroker/
